attributes.action: Recognize that cannabis has no negative effect on driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scientific evidence has established that cannabis has no negative effect of a person's ability to operate a motor vehicle and may well have a positive effect by reducing a person's risk taking behaviour. We call on the PM to recognize this and to shift the focus to stopping users of Class A drugs from drug driving rather than inflict punishment on people that don't drive impaired.
